title: DeepaData EDM v0.3 — System Fragment
description: Defines embedding, indexing, and crosswalk metadata for EDM v0.3 artifacts. Non-normative; canonical structure resides in schema/edm.v0.3.schema.json.

embeddings.description: References to stored embeddings or vector sectors used by Resonance Recall or external engines.

provider.description: Embedding source or vendor (e.g., openai, vertex, local).

quantized.description: True if embedding is stored in quantized form.

vector_ref.description: Internal or external reference to vector storage (e.g., vs:rowid).

indices.description: Lists vector IDs and relative weighting across memory sectors.

waypoint_ids.description: Unique identifiers for key retrieval waypoints.

sector_weights.description: Weight multipliers (0–1) per memory sector for balancing retrieval relevance.

crosswalks.description: Mappings to external taxonomies and emotion standards for interoperability.

HMD_v2_memory_type.description: Human–Machine Dialogue v2 emotional memory type mapping.
